channel.title: Equiping items is not Working Properly
channel.description:
I am in a bit of a snag with many of my equipable items (robes, cloaks, etc.) I am tryiong to equip serveral of them and find that they are equiped to my weapon spot rather than lower body, upper body, or cloaks, ETC.
It is driving me mad because i like the green fremmy robes...

item.title: Equiping items is not Working Properly
item.dc:creator: @Slain Slain
item.description:
@Slain wrote:

Make sure you have the item binding is set.

Check your item.java and make sure the specific id is linked correctly.
